page.title: 12SHOPS AND TRADE IN STEWARTON
page.content: The main shopping area is in the centre of the town. There are 2 supermarkets, a chemist, 3 butchers, 3 drapers, 1 grocer, 1 shoe repairer, 2 bakers, 2 florists, a watchmaker, a health shop, 2 newsagents, a drycleaner's, a fishmonger, an electrician, a toyshop, a shoeshop and a handicraft and gift shop. Shops which have opened this year are a Delicatessan,next to the Post Office, a Frozen Food Shop at 7 High Street, Rainbow, 5 High Street for dressmaking and curtain materials, Everything But, 9 Avenue Street for kitchenware and gifts, Waugh's in Lainshaw Street florist and fruiterer and W.W.Wales has opened a branch of butcher's in High Street.
